snippet: Portugal has begun sounding out Spanish banks on their interest in buying Novo Banco, the successor to the state-rescued Banco Espirito Santo (BES), several sources familiar with the talks said on Tuesday....

headline.print_headline: Portugal Sounds Out Spanish Banks on Novo Banco Sale: Sources
headline.main: Portugal Sounds Out Spanish Banks on Novo Banco Sale: Sources

lead_paragraph: Portugal has begun sounding out Spanish banks on their interest in buying Novo Banco, the successor to the state-rescued Banco Espirito Santo (BES), several sources familiar with the talks said on Tuesday.
